attributes.action: Abolish the right of a "Sole Owner" to Register his/her company a Ltd Company.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A sole owner may register his company as a ltd company then if he wishes, drive the company into debt and insolvency without any personal liability. Having made a company bankrupt through deliberate bad management (it does happen)a company director / owner should be made liable to repay all debts from personal wealth.
